base_character.name: chibi_playable
base_character.base_prompt: game character, playable character, cute chibi proportion, large expressive eyes, clear silhouette, thick outline, simple readable shapes, standing idle pose, front view, single character, anime style, flat shading, clean lineart

negative_prompt: realistic, detailed background, illustration sheet, concept art, multiple characters, thin lines, washed colors, fashion illustration, model pose
